words.definition: A building where planes arrive and depart.
The act of leaving for a trip.
The act of reaching a place.
The area where you pick up your bags.

example.en: I went to the baggage claim area.

words.definition: People or equipment making sure travel is safe.
words.arabic_definition: الأشخاص أو الأجهزة التي تضمن سلامة السفر.

words.definition: The area where goods are checked.
words.arabic_definition: المكان الذي يتم فيه تفتيش البضائع.

example.en: We had to declare items at customs.
example.ar: كان علينا الإفصاح عن البضائع عند الجمارك.

words.definition: The area where you wait for your flight.
words.arabic_definition: المكان الذي تنتظر فيه قبل الرحلة.

words.definition: Control point where documents are checked.
words.arabic_definition: نقطة يتم فيها التحقق من الوثائق.

example.en: We waited at immigration for an hour.

words.definition: Items sold at airports that aren’t taxed.
words.arabic_definition: منتجات تباع بدون ضرائب في المطارات.

example.en: We bought chocolates at the duty-free shop.
